text: When we look back on Tesla if we manage to avoid all the calamities that are lined up, I'm sure it'll be one of the most influential products of our time. Without Tesla the auto manufacturers that Biden praises wouldn't have the guts or vision to develop the cars they are now preparing to sell. There are always politeness experts around to say how they want their revolution to be nicely scented, but it doesn't work that way. You will be offended by the ideas that shake your world. You'll get over it too.
